content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Nice clash. Easy and quick to do. Here my code golf python solution : 

print(sum(str(i).count('1') for i in range(1,int(input())+1)))

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Easy to solve, perfect for CoC

All sections
* Please format "n" as a [[variable]].

Goal section
* Please change "n." to "n,".

* Please fix the typo: "egal" => "equal".

* 2 does not contain "one" digit 1. Please fix the sentence.

Output section
* Please delete the colon at the end.

Thanks.
Thank you for your comment; it has helped me a lot.
